item.description:
Race for the Galaxy

is ranked number 16 out of the 8082 games boardgamegeek.com has ranked.  That means it's a DARNED good game.

(Tic tac toe is number 8082, by the way!)

 

 

It has sort of a steep learning curve, but I've been playing against the computer AI that is available for free download and I'll have a good enough handle on the rules and nuances by this date to teach it to someone who's never played.  Not saying I'll be any good!  After 15 games or so the AI still schools me almost every game!

The rules are available here, thanks to Rio Grande Games, the game's publisher:

Race for the Galaxy Rules.

The basic game only accommodates 2-4 people, so that's the max for this day.  On the other hand, if I get just two we'll still go as long as the other person's still up for it!  My thought is to play until 1 PM or so and then maybe head for lunch across the street at Empire Pizza.  
(Totally optional, of course!)

You're welcome no matter whether you've never played, or if you're a RftG expert!  (If you've never played , please check out the rules and the AI at the links above if you have time.)

Bring $1 to help keep the group going, if you want.  Or not.  It's a donation.  :)

 

Any questions, just ask!
